meanings.definition: A person who uses dynamite as a weapon.
meanings.sent1: The dynamiters caused chaos with their explosives.
meanings.sent2: The police arrested the dynamiters for their dangerous actions.
meanings.sent3: The dynamiters accidentally blew up their own hideout.
meanings.sent4: The dynamiters were like modern-day pirates, striking fear into the town.
meanings.sent5: The image of the dynamiters running with dynamite sticks was terrifying.

meanings.definition: A group of individuals who use dynamite for destructive purposes.
meanings.sent1: The dynamiters planned to demolish the old building.
meanings.sent2: The dynamiters were known for their reckless behavior.
meanings.sent3: The dynamiters thought they could blast their way through any obstacle.
meanings.sent4: The dynamiters' actions shook the foundations of the community.
meanings.sent5: The dynamiters' explosions echoed through the valley.
